sentences: On Tuesday, 17 December, the SBSTA considered Agenda Item 4(a), Longer-term programme of work (FCCC/SBSTA/1996/16 and Add.1).
Delegates specifically considered priorities for methodological work, implications for the budget and necessary institutional and financial arrangements.
enb_long_title: Fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate Fourth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
